hero.title: Cleaner Air, Quieter Streets, Measurable Results
hero.description: Track emissions, noise, and user adoption across your entire portable power fleet. Reporting aligned with CPA grant requirements and city climate action plans.

items.title: Emissions Reduction
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Up to 15-17 tCOâ‚‚ avoided per starter fleet per year. Eliminates NOx, PM2.5, and carbon monoxide from small gas generators. Supports California's small off-road engine regulations and city climate commitments.]

items.title: Generator-Hours Replaced
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Thousands of vendor generator-hours avoided annually across markets, events, and park rentals. Real-time tracking of battery kWh delivered vs. equivalent generator fuel consumption.]

items.title: Policy Pathway
items.description: Pilot data supports permanent clean power requirements in event permits and park rentals. Help staff make the case to Council with measured outcomes, not projections.

items.title: Noise Elimination
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: >90% noise reduction at markets and events vs. gas generators. Residents can enjoy community gatherings without constant engine drone. Vendors report improved customer interactions without shouting over generators.]

items.title: Small Vendor Support
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Subsidy-first model during pilot ensures low-margin vendors aren't priced out. Gradual cost-sharing transition as program scales. Educational support for vendors transitioning from generator ownership.]

items.title: Health & Safety
items.description: Eliminates exhaust fumes in crowded public spaces like farmers markets. Reduces fire risk in parks during dry seasons. LFP battery chemistry provides thermal stability for deployments near crowds and children.

items.title: Cost Transparency
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Compare total cost of ownership: generator purchase + fuel + maintenance + staff time vs. managed battery fleet with shared costs. Business case templates for Council presentations and budget justification.]
